title: Perform an Interactive Rebase
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to use Git's interactive rebase feature to modify and consolidate your commit history, making it more organized and easier to manage.

meta.title: Perform an Interactive Rebase: A Git Mastery Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to clean up your Git commit history using interactive rebase, a powerful feature of the Git version control system.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, git, commit history, interactive rebase, git playground, code management

verify.name: Verify for successful interaction
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 执行交互式变基
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将学习如何使用 Git 的交互式变基功能来修改和合并你的提交历史，使其更有条理且易于管理。

meta.title: 执行交互式变基：Git 掌握挑战
meta.description: 学习如何使用交互式变基清理你的 Git 提交历史，这是 Git 版本控制系统的一项强大功能。
meta.keywords: 版本控制，Git 实验室，Git，提交历史，交互式变基，Git 游乐场，代码管理
